mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_plans ( user_id, goal, persona, custom_tutor_name, roadmap_json, start_date, end_date, progress_rate, status, is_paid, current_level, target_level, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{goal}, #{persona}, #{customTutorName}, #{roadmapJson}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{progressRate}, #{status}, #{isPaid}, #{currentLevel}, #{targetLevel}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM study_plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status IN ('PROCEEDING', 'PAUSED') ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM study_plans WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status IN ('PROCEEDING', 'PAUSED')
mapper.update: UPDATE study_plans SET goal = #{goal}, persona = #{persona}, custom_tutor_name = #{customTutorName}, roadmap_json = #{roadmapJson}, progress_rate = #{progressRate}, current_level = #{currentLevel}, target_level = #{targetLevel}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, is_paid = #{isPaid}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
